title: Por fin nos entendemos 🤝
text: Esta herramienta literalmente salvó nuestro proyecto. Equipos en México, Polonia y China — todos hablando como locales. Es increíble.
author: k.mendez

title: De 👎 para 🔥 em uma reunião
text: Pensei que seria mais uma IA mal feita. Não é. É mais inteligente que metade da equipe. (Não contem para eles que eu disse isso.)
author: — fundador anônimo

title: Sadece vay canına.
text: Ukraynaca konuştum ve akıcı Korece duydular. Gerçek zamanlı. Gecikme yok.
author: Selin_TR

title: ลูกค้าของเราคิดว่าเราจ้างล่าม 🎧
text: ไม่ใช่เลย แค่แพลตฟอร์มนี้ทำงานได้ดีกว่ามนุษย์ส่วนใหญ่ที่เราจ้ายเมื่อปีที่แล้ว
author: Ploy (BizDev)

title: 💡 As reuniões parecem 10x mais inteligentes agora
text: Todo mundo entende o contexto, mesmo entre idiomas diferentes. Parece que finalmente estamos trabalhando na mesma sala — mentalmente.
author: VPProduct

title: *Jangan tidur dengan ini.*
text: Serius. Kamu akan mencobanya sekali dan tidak pernah ingin kembali ke panggilan bilingual yang canggung lagi.

title: ¿Puedo abrazar a su equipo de ingeniería?
text: Esto cambió mi forma de vender. Punto. Los prospectos de habla hispana ahora convierten 2x mejor porque realmente nos entendemos.
author: marcela.codes

title: Felt like I was watching myself speak Japanese 😳
text: I'm not fluent. But the AI sure is. It matched my tone, emotion, and rhythm. Creepy good.
author: Joey

title: İnanılmaz ama gerçek.
text: 3G bağlantıda bile çeviri dayanıyor. Bozmeye çalıştık. Başaramadık.
author: Waleed T.

title: The only tool I recommend to *everyone*
text: Legal, sales, support, HR — every department now uses it. It's like Slack, but for meaning.
author: megan.a ✨

title: versi pendek: ini bekerja. 🤷
text: versi panjang: kami menutup kesepakatan 6 digit dengan klien yang sebelumnya tidak bisa kami ajak bicara langsung. cukup dikatakan.
author: j_ro

title: No more lost-in-translation moments.
text: We used to send follow-up emails to clarify everything. Now meetings are final — nothing gets lost.
author: Claire / Ops

title: 💬 Çok dilli ama yine de BEN
text: Sadece doğru çeviri değil — benim konuştuğum gibi duyuluyor. Çılgınca.
author: Zara 🌍

title: ก่อน: ความเข้าใจผิด หลัง: ความคืบหน้า
text: ใช้เวลาน้อยลงในการอธิบายซ้ำ ใช้เวลามากขึ้นในการทำงาน ปฏิทินของฉันขอบคุณคุณ
author: Siriporn K.

title: Our CEO just said: 'Why aren't we funding this?' 😂
text: We're rolling it out org-wide next quarter. Compliance approved it, too. Let's gooo.
author: anon_cso

title: Mi español es regular. Esto no lo es.
text: Soné como un hablante nativo. Nuestros socios en Bogotá quedaron impresionados.
author: Carlos_Growth

text: Itu ulasannya. Jangan terlalu mikir.
author: — mika.ux

title: 帮我完成了最大的一笔交易
text: 投资人电话会议。英语、普通话和法语的参与者。没有人遗漏任何信息，也没有人需要澄清。第二天我们就签约了。
author: D.T.（A轮）

title: รู้สึกเหมือนเทเลพอร์ตความหมาย ✨
text: ไม่ใช่แค่เรื่องคำพูด — โทนเสียง, ความหมายโดยนัย, ความเร็ว, การประชดประชัน ทุกอย่างถูกจับได้ ทุกอย่างถูกถ่ายทอด
author: Apichat_BKK

title: เมื่อเทคโนโลยี*หลบทาง*
text: เครื่องมือที่ดีที่สุดหายไปในพื้นหลัง เครื่องมือนี้ทำอย่างนั้นได้อย่างแน่นอน และนั่นคือคำชมที่สูงที่สุดที่ฉันให้ได้
author: Somchai_tech

title: This is what modern communication should feel like.
text: We host bi-weekly board meetings with stakeholders from four different continents. Before InterMind, we used to hire interpreters, send transcripts, and waste hours aligning terminology. Now? Everyone speaks, listens, and understands — in real time. No friction. No gaps. No 'can you repeat that'.
author: Olivia R.

title: Dağıtık ekipler için büyük zaman tasarrufu
text: Her toplantıyı iki kez yapıyorduk — bir kez İngilizce, bir kez yerel dillerde. Şimdi tek arama yapıyoruz ve herkes kendi versiyonunu duyuyor. Planlama döngülerimizi kelimenin tam anlamıyla yarıya indirdi.
author: Emre / APAC Ops

title: Era cético. Agora sou evangelista.
text: Honestamente, achei que era só mais um truque de IA. Então testei numa negociação com nossos parceiros em São Paulo. A qualidade da voz, a velocidade, como respeitou o tom — absolutamente profissional. Passamos por tópicos sensíveis sem um mal-entendido sequer.
author: Rafael_SP

title: เครื่องมือออนบอร์ดดิ้งที่ดีที่สุดที่เราไม่เคยวางแผนไว้
text: พนักงานใหม่ของเราในยุโรปตะวันออกแทบไม่พูดภาษาอังกฤษ และเราไม่พูดภาษายูเครน สิ่งนี้ทำให้การฝึกอบรมเข้าถึงได้ตั้งแต่วันแรก — ไม่ต้องแปลเอกสารหรือแปลวิดีโอสอน HR มีความสุข วิศวกรมีประสิทธิภาพ ผู้นำประทับใจ
author: PeopleOpsTeam

title: Feels like magic every time.
text: Even though I know how it works, it still surprises me when I speak Russian and hear myself come out fluently in Italian. The team nailed something special here.
author: Anastasiya L.

title: จากซับไตเติ้ลกะทัดรัดสู่การไหลที่ราบรื่น
text: เราลองทุกอย่างแล้ว: คำบรรยายอัตโนมัติของ YouTube, ล่ามมนุษย์, ปลั๊กอิน Zoom... ไม่มีอะไรรู้สึก 'สด' InterMind ทำได้ การสนทนาไม่รู้สึกเหมือนเนื้อหาที่แปล — รู้สึกเหมือนการพูดต้นฉบับ นั่นมหาศาลสำหรับความเชื่อใจของลูกค้า
author: Niran_support

title: Substitui três ferramentas por uma
text: Antes era: fazer anotações, transcrever, traduzir, resumir, marcar para CRM... Agora está tudo integrado. Meu fluxo de trabalho é metade do esforço e duas vezes mais preciso.
author: Dani

title: Caso real: 7 países, 1 sessão de estratégia
text: Mês passado reunimos líderes regionais do México, Alemanha, Emirados Árabes, Vietnã e África do Sul. Todos falando idiomas nativos diferentes. Saímos com um plano claro, sem confusão e zero atraso. Isso não é só produtividade — é união.
author: VP Strategy

title: Co-founder saya pikir saya mengerjai dia
text: Dia bergabung dengan panggilan, mendengar saya berbicara bahasa Mandarin dengan lancar (versi AI), dan benar-benar pikir saya menyewa penyamar. Teknologinya sebaik itu.
author: arif_jkt

title: Solves a problem we stopped trying to solve.
text: We had accepted that cross-language meetings would always be slow, awkward, and error-prone. InterMind changed that. We're revisiting markets we had written off just because communication is no longer a barrier.

title: Me encanta cómo maneja la jerga de la industria
text: Usamos terminología compleja en tecnología médica. Abreviaciones, frases técnicas, referencias a conceptos de nicho — y el sistema lo interpreta todo correctamente. Eso no es fácil de hacer.
author: Dr. González

title: Kenapa tidak ada yang membangun ini lebih cepat?
text: Jujur — saya marah. Karena saya menghabiskan $12,000+ untuk layanan interpretasi tahun lalu dan ini menyelesaikan semuanya dengan lebih baik untuk sebagian kecil biaya.
author: Ahmad_startup

title: YA. HANYA YA.
text: Setelah mencobanya sekali, sekarang saya bersikeras semua pertemuan saya melalui platform ini. Tidak peduli dengan siapa saya berbicara — saya tahu saya akan dimengerti.
author: dimas.tech

title: My CEO doesn't speak English. Now he does. Kinda.
text: He speaks Arabic, and the system makes him sound fluent in English. In meetings, that changes the power dynamic completely.
author: Said A.

title: Del caos a la claridad
text: Antes: reuniones con nuestro equipo de Latinoamérica eran lentas y llenas de explicaciones repetidas. Ahora: discusiones reales, alineación real.
author: Marta P.

title: AI aksanınızı yargılamıyor.
text: Ağır Fransız aksanı olan biri olarak, aramalarda fazla konuşmaktan kaçınıyordum. Şimdi Fransızca konuşuyorum ve herkes net İngilizce duyuyor. Bu sayede kelimenin tam anlamıyla daha fazla proje yönetmeye başladım.
author: mehmet.b

title: Llamada de emergencia. Comprensión instantánea.
text: Tuve que unirme a una llamada de crisis de último minuto con nuestro equipo en Turquía. El idioma habría sido un gran obstáculo. Esta plataforma lo convirtió en algo sin importancia.
author: COO

title: Funciona. Mesmo quando tudo mais quebra.
text: Conexão ruim? Ainda funciona. Múltiplos falantes? Ainda identifica quem é quem. Ruído de fundo? Ainda entende. Estou impressionado.
author: Rina 🟣

title: Klien benar-benar bertanya alat apa yang kami gunakan.
text: Mereka pikir kami punya tim penerjemah manusia standby. Nope — hanya InterMind yang melakukan tugasnya.
author: SaaS founder

title: Kendi hafızamdan daha çok güveniyorum
text: Canlı çeviri ile aranabilir transkript arasında, hiçbir şeyi kaçırmıyorum. Fotoğrafik hafızası olan bir executive asistanı gibi.
author: Ben T.
